name: jxml-processor
description: Templating system for copying/transforming XML files with JS.

scripts.testGarbage: jxml-processor.exe abcd efgh ijkl mnop qrst
scripts.test: jxml-processor.exe sample/sampleLibrary.js sample/jxml sample/cxml sample/xml/sampleTemplate.xml sample/xml/sampleObjects.xml 2
scripts.testTab: jxml-processor.exe sample/sampleLibrary.js sample/jxml sample/cxml sample/xml/sampleTemplate.xml sample/xml/sampleObjects.xml

author: Stella
